MenuItem.Name: The Plain Jane
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef burger made from fully traceable young heifer meat under months old, iceberg lettuce, beef tomato, onion and mayonnaise.

MenuItem.Name: The Cheese Burger
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef topped with Old Dubliner cheddar cheese, iceberg lettuce, beef tomato, onion and mayonnaise.

MenuItem.Name: The Bacon Cheese Burger
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef topped with Old Dubliner cheddar cheese, cured smoked bacon, red onion, iceberg lettuce, beef tomato and mayonnaise.

MenuItem.Name: The Horseradish Burger
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef with caramelised onion, iceberg lettuce, beef tomato, horseradish and crème fraiche with Cashel Blue cheese.

MenuItem.Name: The Hawaiian
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef with caramelised onion, grilled pineapple, beef tomato, iceberg lettuce, Bobo's burgers sauce and cheese.

MenuItem.Name: The Slaw Burger
MenuItem.Description: Prime juicy beef, home-made coleslaw, iceberg lettuce, beef tomato, red onion, American style mustard.

MenuItem.Name: Traditional Fresh Cod & Chips
MenuItem.Description: The best seller also known as the “Dubliners caviar” served with chunky chips.

MenuItem.Name: Traditional Fresh Cod
MenuItem.Description: The best seller, also known as 'Dublin's Caviar'

MenuItem.Name: Burrito
MenuItem.Description: A large flour tortilla filled with a choice of rice, choice of beans, filling of your choice, salsa, cheese and sour cream.

MenuItem.Name: Burrito Bowl
MenuItem.Description: Take all the ingredients that go into a burrito and mix them up in a bowl without the tortilla.

MenuItem.Name: Fajita
MenuItem.Description: A large flour tortilla filled with a choice of rice, sauteed peppers and onions, filling of your choice, salsa, cheese and sour cream.

MenuItem.Name: Fajita Bowl
MenuItem.Description: Take all the ingredients that go into a fajita and mix them up in a bowl without the tortilla.

MenuItem.Name: Salad
MenuItem.Description: Crisp romaine lettuce, choice of filling, choice of beans or sauteed peppers and onions, salsa, cheese and sour cream.

MenuItem.Name: Veggie Burger
MenuItem.Description: Veggie Patty, Tomato, Onion, Pickle, Lettuce & Secret Sauce.

MenuItem.Name: Bacon & Cheese Burger
MenuItem.Description: Grilled bacon, melted cheddar cheese and secret sauce

MenuItem.Name: Cheezy Chicken
MenuItem.Description: Cheddar cheese, tomato, onion, lettuce & secret sauce served in a bun.
